intro: Psychotria schumannii, commonly known as the Schumann's psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and produces clusters of small, white to greenish-yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland rainforests. The plant contains various alkaloids, which have been of interest in botanical and pharmacological research.
